term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - effective thermal cross-section
term.title: effective thermal cross-section

item.text: A fictitious cross-section for a specified reaction, which, when multiplied by the 2200 metre-per-second flux density, gives the correct reaction rate for thermal neutrons.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 2513. 'Nomenclature for radioanalytical chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 2517 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466122513)
